greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = {greatest primorial less than or equal to n} divided by {greatest primorial number which divides n} = A260188(n)/A053589(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..11550
Index entries for sequences related to primorial numbers
mathematica: Table[(j = #; While[! Divisible[n, Times @@ Prime@ Range@ j], j--]; (Times @@ Prime@ Range@ #)/(Times @@ Prime@ Range@ j)) &@ (k = 0; While[Times @@ Prime@ Range[k + 1] <= n, k++]; k), {n, 120}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Aug 30 2016 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 30 2016
